text: Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

You freeze.

What?

"Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

You know that voice came from the bee, even if you don't want to believe it.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

You freeze.

What?

"Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

You know that voice came from the bee, even if you don't want to believe it. It can't be true.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

You freeze.

What?

"Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

You know that voice came from the bee, even if you don't want to believe it. It can't be true.

"Is this real?"

You ask that to yourself, but the bee responds, "Of course it is."

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

You freeze.

What?

"Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

You know that voice came from the bee, even if you don't want to believe it. It can't be true.

"Is this real?"

You ask that to yourself, but the bee responds, "Of course it is."

"But bees can't talk," you reply, a little more uncertainly.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

You freeze.

What?

"Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

You know that voice came from the bee, even if you don't want to believe it. It can't be true.

"Is this real?"

You ask that to yourself, but the bee responds, "Of course it is."

"But bees can't talk," you reply, a little more uncertainly.

"Yes we can."

"But I thought I was allergic to you guys. Everyone has always kept me away my entire life."

If a bee can chuckle, that is definitely what they did.

"They kept you away because they were afraid of you knowing your true potential. Come with me."
